fn.p: AAI: areal asymmetric index, t: t-value, p: p-value, std: standard deviation. All label names follow Glasser, Coalson [34].

extracted-table.table-caption: Group differences in the interhemispheric areal asymmetry between humans and macaques.

caption.title: Group differences in the interhemispheric areal asymmetry between humans and macaques.

fn.p: AAI: areal asymmetric index, t: t-value for two-sample t-tests, p: p-value, std: standard deviation. All label names follow Glasser, Coalson [34].
